chinese: 以.交换；替换；对调 n。交换物
男孩们正在互相交换动物卡片。
english: The boys are swapping animal cards with each other

chinese: n，目的地，终点
他们的目的地是西天。
english: The destination of their journey is the Western Heaven

chinese: 以联系，联想；联合 n，伙伴；同事，合作人adi. 副的
人们总是会把红玫瑰与爱情和浪漫联系在一起。
english: People always associate red roses with love and romance

chinese: n.照明
树间的灯照亮了这条街道。
english: The lights amongst the trees provided an illumination to the street

chinese: n.地位；状况；身份
在我们俱乐部，VIP地位很高。
english: The VIPs have high status in our club

chinese: v.拒绝；抵制
她直接拒绝嫁给他。
U. 羞辱；使蒙耻
那个可怜的男孩在学校遭受了严重的羞辱。
english: The poor boy was badly humiliated at school

chinese: n. 大灾难
建地大宋維让这座城市一夜之间论为废墟。
english: The catastrophe struck in the night and destroyed the city

chinese: n.费用
他被这个发型背后巨额的隐形费用惊呆了。
english: He was shocked by the huge amount of hidden fees behind such a haircut

chinese: V.追赶；进行，从事
警察正在追赶两个小偷，他们偷了一个女人的钱包。
english: The police were pursuing the two thieves who had stolen a woman's purse

chinese: v.关押，监禁
她们因冒犯皇后而被关进了牢房。
english: They were imprisoned for offending the queen

chinese: adv. 尽管如此，仍然
尽管他讨厌蔬菜，但因为蔬菜有益健康，他还是得吃它们。
english: He hates vegetables but, due to their health benefits, eats them nonetheless

chinese: n.文学；文献
教授正在进行一场有关中国现代文学的讲座。
english: The professor is giving a lecture on modern Chinese literature

chinese: vi. 退休；退役
他退休后去了乡下居住。
english: He lives in the countryside after retiring from work

chinese: n. 跨栏用栏，障碍 Y跨栏，跨过
运动员们正跨过栏架。
english: The athletes are jumping over the hurdles

chinese: 飞探测，探索 几.探针，探测器
他手拿仪器探寻金子的位直。
english: He held a device to probe for the location of the gold
